reviewText:
All the product from Susan Polgar are really good. It's very organized, the prepared the material like a professional.
And I have learned too much.
The only thing this pack needs is a disc of strategy.
Amazing collection. It is a must for all levels . thank you! #
3 of the 14 discs had problems to play. I contact them on Friday and receive the replacement next Tuesday. They also send me "masterchess 7000" as a gift. Excellent customer service.
